name: Don't Look (TrialGames)
description:
Don't Look is a puzzle and strategy game set in a mysterious castle where everything seems to have been destroyed by unknown creatures.  Your mission is find what is really happening.

By closing your eyes you will see a totally different world where you can find new clues that will open paths to unexplored places. Take care and don't let the enemies kill you!

You can follow us on Twitter to stay tuned for new updates: @TrialGamesStudio

Note: At the moment this is the beta version of the game, the release will be in about a month as it is part of a final year project.
